main_definition: To do something another time or repeat a previous action or occurrence.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Repeat an action or event that has happened before
meanings_and_examples.example: I failed the exam, so I have to study and take it again.

meanings_and_examples.definition: With another attempt at doing something
meanings_and_examples.example: She tried painting a picture but couldn't finish it. She decided to try again with more practice.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Once more, or anew; repeated or recurrent
meanings_and_examples.example: The rain started again as soon as we stepped outside the building.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In a similar manner to before, or in a repetitive way
meanings_and_examples.example: He spoke again in his usual monotonous tone.
Let's watch that movie again. I enjoyed it but didn't get all the details this time around.
